В этой игре ты узнаешь:
1)Кто ты по жизни
2)Кто твоя мама и папа
3)Где ты на самом деле живешь 
4)Вычислять тебя по IP и будут новые друзья
5)Можешь встретить новых друзей из своего города и бухнуть
6)Узнаешь про свою страну лучше чем по телевизору
7)И могут обматерить тебя или даже угрожать )
В целом самая лучшая игра всех времен )

I love this game! though I do have to say, When it cost money, there was a lot of hackers,  now that its free, there's even more.  But, it is fun to play and i enjoy it! and, its free, and if you don't own it, get it.  I mean, its free, there's no reason NOT to get it. If you don't end up liking it, then don't play it.  If you DO like it,  well, you now you own it.  :)
CS é em minha preferência perssoal o melhor jogo já inventado. Jogabilidade simples e  direta. Tudo o que um jogo tem que ter.
tactical shooter, simple game with a high skill cap

It's Counter-Strike, it's been the world's most popular multiplayer FPS for two decades for a reason. It's unbelievable simple to pick up and understand, but incredibly difficult to master. Valve has genuinely done a great job updating it, and with VACnet, Trust Factor, and Overwatch in place, they've actually managed to reduce the amount of cheaters most players encounter to near-zero. And that's even with the game now free-to-play. There's no reason not to give it a try.
CS:GO is a great game with amazing and quality graphics, I highly recommend this game to players that are looking to find a game with action

Убила жизнь на это дерьмо, пойду опять отсосу в бумаге.
THE BEST GAME EVER MADE(for me).

To me CS:GO is the most stripped back barebones shooter which is why I love it so much, no perks, no killstreaks, no gimmicks its all about skill. Those things have their places in other games but CS:GO is perfect for the competitive shooter player who likes honing their skills. 8/10
